item.title: America's last living ace pilot from World War II dies at age 103
item.description: A World War II veteran from Nebraska believed to be America’s last surviving “ace” pilot because he shot down five enemy planes has died

item.title: Death toll from Legionnaires' disease outbreak in New York City rises to 6 and infections hit 111
item.description: New York City officials have discovered a sixth death linked to a Legionnaires’ disease outbreak in Central Harlem, where more than 100 people have be...

item.title: Villanova University reports an active shooter on campus, tells students to barricade doors
item.description: Police are responding to a report of an active shooter on Villanova University’s campus

item.title: Trump administration is reviewing all 55 million foreigners with US visas in growing crackdown
item.description: The Trump administration says it’s reviewing more than 55 million foreigners who have valid U.S. visas for any violations that could lead to deportati...

item.title: Colorado funeral home investigated after decomposing bodies found behind hidden door
item.description: Colorado authorities say they are investigating a funeral home operated by a county coroner where inspectors found several decomposing bodies
